languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slice, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}快刀一闪{/g}或{g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}死亡轮舞{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，此次攻击都会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}快刀一闪{/g}或{g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}死亡轮舞{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，此次攻击都会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。

languages.text: 使用者が突撃、スラッシュ、死の舞踏の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙間{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させるたびに、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が突撃、一閃、死の舞踏の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するたびに、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を負わせる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} con las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Tajo{/g} o {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danza macabra{/g}, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) al objetivo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} con las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Tajo{/g} o {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danza macabra{/g}, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) al objetivo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Schneiden{/g} oder {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Totentanz{/g} , belegt er das Ziel mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Schneiden{/g} oder {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Totentanz{/g} , belegt er das Ziel mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10).

languages.text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Рассечение{/g} или {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Пляска смерти{/g}, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Рассечение{/g} или {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Пляска смерти{/g}, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).

Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} Рывок, Рассечение или Пляска смерти, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} avec les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Lacérer{/g} ou {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse macabre{/g}, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) à la cible.

languages.text: Giyen kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Kesme{/g} veya {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Meşum Raks{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g} ile ne zaman bir {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}açıklığa{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vursa{/g} hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} (10) oluşturur.
